text: Pharisee pa'n atheinuo ah a-ngirra aleini,18:11 atheinuo ah angirra Pathian aleini; aleiilaak larik achu, intheiya halli ama diang alei inni. ‘Pathian, kei'n nang kanaminpaak, tichu mi ngai angnga keihi kakheel innuomma mi ngai kakasuut, malung inthiangmak, emakli zool-inthai emong, hiwa rampar kakhoompa ka-ang um emong.
